author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IMELDA EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE CONDITIONS TO BERMUDA BY WEDNESDAY EVENING...
summary: ...IMELDA EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE CONDITIONS TO BERMUDA BY WEDNESDAY EVENING... As of 5:00 PM EDT Tue Sep 30 the center of Imelda was located near 29.4, -75.5 with movement ENE at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 978 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IMELDA EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE CONDITIONS TO BERMUDA BY WEDNESDAY EVENING... As of 5:00 PM EDT Tue Sep 30 the center of Imelda was located near 29.4, -75.5 with movement ENE at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 978 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Imelda (AT4/AL092025)
